text: comments Dakota Johnson sure made a fashion statement on Wednesday. The 27-year-old actress was seen in a $34,000 Gucci mink coat that featured a skinned tiger on the back. The daughter of Melanie Griffith was on her way into the Today Show to promote Fifty Shades Darker. Scroll down for video Wow: Dakota Johnson made a statement as she headed to the Today Show on Wednesday She added a chic and classic Louis Vuitton handbag to her look as she also accessorized with a pair of black boots. The brunette beauty made sure to stop and sign some autographs for the waiting fans. Her choppy brunette locks were styled in subtle beach waves as covered up in a pair of large designer sunglasses. Pretty pricey: The 27-year-old actress bundled up in an elaborate $34,000 Gucci Tiger intarsia mink coat Friendly: The brunette beauty made sure to stop and sign some autographs for the waiting fans Speaking to Hoda Kotb, Dakota said her and Jamie Dornan can handle the physical closeness in the film because they are used to it. 'We have a level of comfort with each other and trust,' she said. 'And as uncomfortable as it is to do scenes like that anyway we probably figured out the best possible way to do it,' she added. Last minute touch up: Speaking to Hoda Kotb, Dakota said her and Jamie Dornan can handle the physical closeness in the film because they are used to it Checking on the eyes: 'We have a level of comfort with each other and trust,' she said about working with Dornan More: She also added: 'And as uncomfortable as it is to do scenes like that anyway we probably figured out the best possible way to do it' She also teased fans with what to expect the second time around: 'Christian and Anastasia decide to give it another shot... You really get to understand who these people are.' The film, which will be released on Valentine's Day, is the second installment in the franchise. It continues the story between Christian and Anastasia. Christian is now wrestling his inner demons while Anastasia is being confronted by his past lovers.
